pullRequest.title: HDDS-2848. Recon changes to make snapshots work with OM HA.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Implemented changes proposed in the Jira and added an integration test.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-2848
How was this patch tested?
New integration test added.

commit.message: HDDS-2848. Recon changes to make snapshots work with OM HA.

nodes.bodyText: We don't need to set the Recon HTTP and RPC port. By default a free port is assigned. The setters are needed in case the test needs to know the port that was assigned.
Do we need to trigger an OM DB sync here and see if the sync is working?
For single node RATIS, we can still use the regular URL.

commit.message: Verify snapshot is synced to Recon.
